import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PaticipantesService } from '../../services/paticipantes.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sorteo', templateUrl: './sorteo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sorteo.component.scss'] }) export class SorteoComponent { participants: string[] = []; constructor(private _participanteServices: PaticipantesService) { this.participants = this._participanteServices.getData('participante') || []; } addParticipant(participantInput: HTMLInputElement): void { const name = participantInput.value.trim(); if (name) { this.participants.push(name); this._participanteServices.saveData('participants', this.participants); participantInput.value = ''; // Limpiar el input } } deleteParticipant(name: string) { const index = this.participants.indexOf(name); if (index !== -1) { this.participants.splice(index, 1); this._participanteServices.saveData('participante', this.participants); } } }
